title: Gyroscope miscalibrated by ~6 degrees (Camera app, protractor apps, etc.)
content:
Hi all,

I just factory reset my Pixel 3, and I think the level of my phone is off. The Camera app shows a "hint" that I am 6 degrees off-axis when taking a seemingly level photo, and any protractor apps that I download are approximately 6 degrees off until I recalibrate them. Any tips on fixing my phone's gyroscope?

Thanks!
